import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' class MegaMenu extends Component { constructor(props) { super(); } MegaMenu() { var acc = document.getElementsByClassName("accordion"); var accNum = acc.length; var i; for (i = 0; i < accNum; i++) { acc[i].addEventListener("click", function () { this.classList.toggle("active"); var panel = this.nextElementSibling; if (panel.style.maxHeight) { panel.style.maxHeight = null; } else { panel.style.maxHeight = panel.scrollHeight + "px" } }) } } render() { const Catlist =this.props.data; const MyView =C return (
